name: III - Poem of Flowers and Rivers

system.description:
You sing a song praising the tranquility of spirit.

Spend 1 Beat to sing out to burst 2: heal 1 all allies that can hear you in the burst, and then all enemies that can hear you in the burst become confused. All haze tiles in the burst suffer the strong wind of your song.

Let There Be No Other Road But Me: Spend 2 Beats to heal 2 all allies instead and all enemies become taunted to you until the end of your next riff.

No Mud, No Lotus, No Gloom, No Joy: Spend 3 Beats. This extends to the entire battlefield: all allies also now gain +1d on their next attack.
system.flavor: Sing a song of joy! For even in the darkest days there are burning bright bonfires. What is darkness if not an absence of light? What is pain but a consequent of life? In this Festival of the Longest Night, rejoice! Happiness cannot be obtained, it is a becoming. Become joyful, Find Glory Beyond Heaven.
